sentences.en: A light hoarfrost covered the fields.
sentences.cn: 一层薄薄的冰霜覆盖了田野。

sentences.en: He giveth snow like wool: scattered the hoarfrost like ashes.
sentences.cn: 他降雪如羊毛,撒霜如炉灰.

sentences.en: Patches of hoarfrost under the firs sparkled rosy reflections.
sentences.cn: 冷杉下,斑斑点点的白霜闪耀着天空玫瑰色的映像.

sentences.en: The percentage of plate types ranges from 30 to 90 depending upon hoarfrost frequency.
sentences.cn: 盘型的百分率随白霜频率而异,自30到90.

sentences.en: The reeds and rushes are deeply green, and the white dew is turned into hoarfrost.
sentences.cn: 蒹葭苍苍 、 白露为霜.

sentences.en: Under the hoarfrost the slightest twig of birches is white.
sentences.cn: 在霜下桦树的最轻微的枝是白色的.

trans.tran_en: a thin layer of ice that forms on objects outside when it is very cold
